message:
Anyway, I'm curious what people have picked up (dramatica-wise) from the first two episodes.

Obviously, there's lots we can't know. And things can be misleading.

But, still curious.
If you're trying to trick me into looking up...
haha, I've got a terrible internet connection, and I got booted.
is it any good so far?
I had to force myself to watch the second episode.
That's why I'm asking about the beginning!
My initial reaction is that it is too talky.
I watched the first episode (pilot) last night.  Did I miss something?  The ads have images from the takeover/attack by the aliens, but the first episode started long after that event.

The ads continue to be misleading, mixing pieces from earlier and later episodes to tell you what is coming up.

I think it's too talky, too. I also think that it sets up (and then misses!) crucial avenues of conflict.

In terms of Dramatica, it seems as though the MC and the OS are both in Do-er Domains, but I'm not sure I see anything to predict much more than that.
